result.execSummary:
All charges against Steven A Slater in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Steven A Slater is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Steven A Slater

11:06 AM Defendant Steven A Slater in court, in custody.  Attorney McKenna Marie Quinter in court for Steven A Slater.  Attorney Jennifer Flynn in court for State of Wisconsin. Court Reporter Donna Moore. 
State is seeking to vacate the warrant. Has reviewed the case and has some concerns. State moves to dismiss this matter. 
BTC: VACATE WARRANT. State's motion to dismiss is granted.
Return on warrant on September 7, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Warrant/capias/commitment entered into all three systems and forwarded to RCSO/Dispatch
Warrant forwarded to JP for entry.

Bond forfeiture notice -
     Order forfeiting bail and notice of application for judgment. Missed court 8/30/2022. $1,000 signature bond requested/ordered forfeited.

8:49 AM Defendant Steven A Slater not in court.  Attorney Jennifer Flynn in court for State of Wisconsin. Court Reporter Donna Moore. 
Matter scheduled as a status conference.
Defendant does not appear. 
BTC: No appearance, Bench Warrant requested/ordered, bond forfeited.
State's NOI to Introduce Certd Public Records
DA AUTHORIZATION TO OBTAIN COPIES OF CERTAIN EVIDENCE

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions: Make all court appearances on time. Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit. No violent contact with HALO, or anyone working or residing there.

2:24 PM Prosecuting attorney John M Wagner in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Steven A Slater appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Elizabeth Martha Angove appeared by video for Steven A Slater. Court Reporter Mark Garvin. 
Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.
Status conference scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status conference on August 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Initial appearance on June 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
